ISSUE.TITLE: Empty guest users after 404 error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.00 We found a weird issue. When somebody enter the URL which doesn't exist, for example yourstore.com/content/image.png (what's important, it must be URL with a file), nopCommerce will create an empty guest record in database. It's easy way to overload the database of the store which has limits. I suppose it's not a desired effect. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/51122/empty-guest-users-after-404-error.aspx

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2902 Ignore culture when static resource is requested
